text: Jaime Ortiz Betancur Airport is an airport serving the town of Chigorodó in the Antioquia Department of Colombia. The airport is on the north side of the town, across the small Guaduas River, which feeds into the Gulf of Urabá. The Los Cedros VOR-DME (Ident: LCE) is located north-northwest of the airport. ==See also== * * *Transport in Colombia *List of airports in Colombia ==References== ==External links== *OpenStreetMap - Chigorodó *OurAirports - Chigorodó *FallingRain - Chigorodó Airport *HERE/Nokia - Chigorodó * Category:Airports in Colombia Category:Colombia transport-related lists
title: Jaime Ortiz Betancur Airport
